languages.text: {n}Хрустнув затекшей от многочасового чтения документов шеей, Инцендия вновь зачерпывает серебряной ложечкой мозг из открытого черепа бедолаги, стоящего подле нее. Тут и там вы замечаете слуг, сгибающихся под тяжелыми стопками все новых и новых доносов, документов и приговоров.{/n}

{n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хрустнув затекшей от многочасового чтения документов шеей, Инцендия вновь зачерпывает серебряной ложечкой мозг из открытого черепа бедолаги, стоящего подле нее. Тут и там вы замечаете слуг, сгибающихся под тяжелыми стопками все новых и новых доносов, документов и приговоров.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck that must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading. Then she takes another scoop from the open skull of the man next to her. Everywhere you look, there are servants buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia cracks her neck that must have grown stiff after so many hours of reading. Then she takes another scoop from the open skull of the man next to her. Everywhere you look, there are servants buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅转了转脖子。读了这么久的卷宗，她的脖子肯定已经发僵了。随后，她再次拿起银勺，从那个头颅被切开的人脑子里舀了一勺脑浆。无论你看向哪里，都只能看到一群仆人，手里拿着成堆的告发书、逮捕令与其他文件，累得上气不接下气。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅转了转脖子。读了这么久的卷宗，她的脖子肯定已经发僵了。随后，她再次拿着银勺，从那个头颅被切开的人脑子里舀了一勺脑浆。无论你看向哪里，都只能看到一群仆人，手里拿着成堆的告发书、逮捕令与其他文件，累得上气不接下气。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}何時間も書類を読んでいたインセンディアは首をゴリゴリ鳴らしつつ、隣に立っている哀れな男の開いた頭蓋骨に銀のスプーンを突っ込み、脳みそをすくった。どこを見渡しても、使用人たちは新しい糾弾状や令状、その他の書類の重たい山に苦戦している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何時間も書類を読んでいたインセンディアは首をゴリゴリ鳴らしつつ、隣に立っている哀れな男の開いた頭蓋骨に銀のスプーンを突っ込み、脳みそをすくった。どこを見渡しても、使用人たちは新しい糾弾状や令状、その他の書類の重たい山に苦戦している。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Crujiéndose el cuello, rígido de tantas horas seguidas leyendo documentos, Incendia vuelve a coger una cucharada del cerebro del pobre hombre a su lado. Mires donde mires, los sirvientes nadan entre pilas pesadas de nuevas denuncias, órdenes judiciales y otros documentos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Crujiéndose el cuello, rígido de tantas horas seguidas leyendo documentos, Incendia vuelve a coger una cucharada del cerebro del pobre hombre muerto, que está a su lado, con una cuchara de plata. Mires donde mires, los sirvientes nadan entre pilas pesadas de nuevas denuncias, órdenes judiciales y otros documentos.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia lässt ihren Hals knacken, der vom stundenlangen Studium zahlreicher Dokumente ganz steif ist. Erneut hebt sie mit ihrem silbernen Löffel ein wenig Gehirnmasse aus dem offenen Schädel des armen Burschen, der neben ihr steht. Wohin du auch blickst, ächzen Diener unter schweren Stapeln von neuen Anklageschriften, Handelsbriefen und anderen Dokumenten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia lässt ihren Hals knacken, der vom stundenlangen Studium zahlreicher Dokumente ganz steif ist. Sie hebt mit einem silbernen Löffel erneut das Gehirn aus dem offenen Schädel des armen Burschen, der neben ihr steht. Wohin du auch blickst, ächzen Diener unter schweren Stapeln von neuen Anklageschriften, Handelsbriefen und anderen Dokumenten.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia fait craquer son cou que plusieurs heures de lecture ont dû crisper, puis elle reprend une cuillère de cervelle dans le crâne ouvert de l'homme debout à côté d'elle. Tout autour de vous, des serviteurs croulent sous des piles de dénonciations, de mandats et d'autres documents du même type.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia fait craquer son cou que plusieurs heures de lecture ont dû crisper, puis elle reprend une cuillère de cervelle dans le crâne ouvert de l'homme recroquevillé à côté d'elle. Tout autour de vous, des serviteurs croulent sous des piles de dénonciations, de mandats et d'autres documents du même type.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Saatler boyunca doküman okumaktan tutulmuş boynunu kütleten İncendia, gümüş kaşığını bir kez daha yanında dikilen zavallının açılmış kafatasına daldırıp beyin kaşıklıyor. Her yanında hizmetkârlar; yeni suç duyurularından, tutuklama emirlerinden ve diğer dokümanlardan oluşan ağır balyaların içine gömülmüş hâlde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cracking her neck, stiff from many hours of reading documents, Incendia again dips her silver spoon and scoops out brain matter from the open skull of the poor fellow standing next to her. Everywhere you look, servants are buckling under heavy stacks of new denunciations, warrants, and other documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Saatler boyunca doküman okumaktan tutulmuş boynunu kütleten İncendia, gümüş kaşığını bir kez daha yanında dikilen zavallının açılmış kafatasına daldırıp beyin kaşıklıyor. Her ne yöne bakarsan bak, hizmetkârlar, yeni suç duyurularından, tutuklama emirlerinden ve diğer dokümanlardan oluşan ağır balyaların içine gömülmüş hâldeler.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
